features.title: Advanced Image Conversion
features.description: Convert your images between WebP, PNG, and JPG formats while maintaining quality. WebP offers superior compression for web use, while PNG preserves transparency and JPG ensures wide compatibility.

features.title: Geotagging Benefits
features.description: Add precise location data to your images' EXIF metadata. Perfect for photographers, travel bloggers, and businesses needing to organize and track image locations. Enhance your content with location context.

features.title: Batch Processing
features.description: Save time by converting multiple images simultaneously. Our concurrent processing feature lets you handle bulk conversions efficiently, with higher tier plans offering more parallel conversions.

features.title: API Integration (Coming Soon)
features.description: Automate your image processing workflow with our robust API. From basic integration in Pro plans to advanced enterprise solutions in Business and Lifetime plans, scale your operations efficiently.

apiTiers.title: Pro API
apiTiers.description: Basic REST API access with rate limits

apiTiers.title: Business API
